elements.name: Navigate through ToneOp Care, add products to cart and wishlist, and verify actions

steps.name: the user login with valid credentials and is on the ToneOp home page
the user taps on the Care button
the user should navigate to the ToneOp Care page
the user scrolls down and taps on Add to Cart for the first product
the user taps on the Wishlist button
the user verifies if there is any product in the wishlist
the user tap back button and taps on the Cart icon from ToneOp Care Page
the user should see the added product in the cart
the user taps on the Delete button
a popup should appear with Yes and Cancel options
the user taps on Yes
the user should see an empty cart message
the user taps on the Back button
the user should navigate back to the ToneOp Care page
the user taps on All Products
the user taps on Add to Wishlist for the first product
the user taps on the Wishlist icon

steps.name: the user should see the recently added item in the wishlist
the user taps on the Cart icon2
the cart should be empty
the user taps on the Back button
the user should navigate back to the wishlist page
the user taps on the Remove Wishlist button
the wishlist should be empty with a message
the user taps on the Back button
the user should navigate back to the marketplace page
the user taps on Add to Cart on the first product
the user taps on the Back button
the user taps on Add to Cart on the first product on another page
the user taps on the Cart icon1
the user should see both products added from different pages in the cart
Application is closed

name: End-to-End Testing of ToneOp Care Page
